title: Super Bowl Preview and Predictions | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 394)
description:
Final thoughts, opinions, and keys to the Rams-Patriots matchup, including insights from former NFL players, Sean McVay's and Bill Belichick’s game plans, Todd Gurley’s importance, Julian Edelman’s Hall of Fame candidacy, and much more.
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark
Try Hopsy!
